prerequisite: Invoker, Covenant of Wrath class feature
name: Vessel of Ichor
text: To strengthen you for the hardships that lie ahead, you have been given a rare blessing: You have drunk a single drop of ichor, the blood of the gods. The potency of ichor is more than the mortal frame was meant to bear, and the effect of consuming even a drop was almost enough to kill you. But you survived, and now a tiny portion of immortal blood flows through your veins.

features.invoker'sBlood(11thLevel): When you use your armor of wrath power, you deal 2d6 extra damage if you are bloodied
features.vessel'sAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to take an extra standard action, you also gain an extra minor action you can use before the end of your next turn
features.vessel'sResistance(16thLevel): You gain resist 5 to all damage while you are bloodied

flavorText: I am more than mortal, for I have tasted the blood of the gods.
